subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jermaine O’Neal scored 9 points after sitting out more than two months with a knee injury, and the Indiana Pacers beat the visiting Miami Heat, 105-85, on Monday night.
snippet: Jermaine O’Neal scored 9 points after sitting out more than two months with a knee injury, and the Indiana Pacers beat the visiting Miami Heat, 105-85, on Monday night.
